hero_subtitle_1: Experience the pure delight of our dairy products, made with passion and care.
hero_subtitle_2: Directly from lush pastures to your table, ensuring natural goodness.
hero_subtitle_3: Nourish your body with our wholesome and tasty dairy selections.
hero_subtitle_4: Blending time-honored methods with modern excellence for superior dairy.
hero_subtitle_5: Bringing joy and nutrition to your family every single day.

from_our_farms: From Our Farms to Your Table
from_our_farms_desc: ARIB DAIRY is committed to bringing you the freshest and purest dairy products. Our journey begins on lush, green farms where our cows are raised with care and respect, ensuring the highest quality milk.
quality_you_can_taste_desc: We combine traditional methods with modern technology to process our dairy products, maintaining their natural goodness and rich flavor. Every product undergoes rigorous quality checks to meet the highest standards.
committed_to_community_desc: Beyond our products, we are dedicated to sustainable practices and supporting our local communities. We believe in fostering a healthy environment and contributing positively to society.

farm_info_title: Natural Taste from ARIB Dairy Farms!
farm_info_description: At ARIB DAIRY, we take pride in delivering 100% natural, fresh, and wholesome dairy products. From our farms to your table, every drop is packed with care and quality.
farm_fact1_description: Our milk is sourced from cows raised on natural feed, free from GMOs and harmful additives.
farm_fact2_description: We produce premium dairy products that combine great taste with essential nutrition.
farm_fact3_description: Our products are rich in natural nutrients to keep you and your family healthy.
farm_fact4_description: Our cows graze freely on lush pastures, ensuring the freshest and purest milk.
